verbs.description: unhate (third-person singular simple present unhates, present participle unhating, simple past and past participle unhated)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To leave off, cease, or desist from hating.
examples: I hate you! And I'll never unhate you or nothing!

entries.meaning: The lack, absence, or omission of hate; hatelessness; love.
examples: Hold me. I am perishing. Achilles We can never perish. It is Unlove and unhate that give form To phantasms of time and space.
